Concept.Comments: warning message to the user

Concept.Id: NOT ENOUGH CLIPS ANALYZED WITH XSTRAIN 2D

Clinical term present in Q3: Vd stands for Diastolic Volume
Clinical term present in Q3: Vs stands for Systolic Volume
Clinical term present in Q3: EF stands for Ejection Fraction
Clinical term present in Q3: CO stands for Cardiac Output
Clinical term present in Q3: DSI stands for Diastolic Sphericity Index
Clinical term present in Q3: SSI stands for Systolic Sphericity Index
Stands for Milliliters (present in Q2 and Q4 (y axis of the Graphs))
(present in Q4 to indicate the x axis values of the graph representations)
Stands for Milliseconds (present in Q2 and Q4 (x axis of the Graphs))
Heart Cycle duration
(the short context is used in Q2 for the EF measurement; the medium context is used Q4 (y axis of the Graphs) for Strain measurement)
(present in Q2 for the CO measurement)
(present in Q4 (y axis of the Graphs) for Myocardial velocities measurement)
(present in Q4 (y axis of the Graphs) for Strain Rate measurement)
(present in Q4 (y axis of the Graphs) for Displacement measurement)
